document.full_text: just a few months ago, benghazi police colonel abdallah shweiter spent his time dealing with orders to silence muammar gaddafi's critics. these days, he's busy doing what his real job was all along -- hunting down thieves, crooks and stolen cars.
document.title: east libya police have new priority: fighting crime
lines_and_colors: just a few months ago, benghazi police colonel abdallah shweiter spent his time dealing with orders to silence muammar gaddafi's critics. these days, he's busy doing what his real job was all along -- hunting down thieves, crooks and stolen cars.
